textSub.string: A toxic spill here has turned many of the local fish into\n poisonous mutants. Be careful, or you might just end up\n that way too!

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
Jellyfish are friends?
 Jellyfish pack a mean sting, but they can be useful too.
 Hide behind them and use them to shield you from
 predators. Their sting affects even the biggest fish!
